name: Alien Hunter (HunterToni)
description:
OVERVIEW

Sayid and Friends that made of 6 computer science students presents Alien Hunter, an adventure/shooter game.

"It's not about galaxies we'd travel, it's about returning home, where out heart belongs"

Exploring space will always be Toni's favourite journey. but space won't be too decent for Toni to travel. GOMGOM, mysterious alien creature and its army will make sure Toni's journey back to his home planet won't be that easy. 

Can Toni explore the space and hunt down the equipments to defeat all GOMGOM's army? The answer is in your hand.

CONTROLS:

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys : Move

Left Click on Mouse : Shoot Projectile

Sayid and Friends
